message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper deals with the application of Convolutional Neural Networks (ConvNets) for human action recognition in videos. This falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The paper also discusses different ways of fusing ConvNet towers both spatially and temporally, which involves machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories. The paper proposes a new ConvNet architecture for spatiotemporal fusion of video snippets, which involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE) sub-categories.
